mapper.select: SELECT br.id AS `id`, br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, br.recover_account AS recoverAccount, br.credit_amount AS creditAmount, br.nid AS tenderNid, br.accede_order_id AS accedeOrderId, br.credit_status AS creditStatus, 1 as recoverPeriod, FROM_UNIXTIME(br.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS recoverTime FROM ht_borrow_recover br LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron ba ON ba.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid AND ba.api_type = 1 WHERE br.recover_time < unix_timestamp(CURDATE()) AND ( b.borrow_style = 'end' OR b.borrow_style = 'endday' ) AND (br.recover_yestime = '' OR br.recover_yestime IS NULL) AND br.recover_status = 0 AND ba.id IS NULL

SELECT brp.id as `id`, brp.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, brp.recover_account AS recoverAccount, CASE WHEN (brp.accede_order_id is null or brp.accede_order_id = '') THEN brp.credit_amount + brp.credit_interest ELSE brp.credit_amount + brp.credit_interest_amount END AS creditAmount, brp.nid AS tenderNid, brp.accede_order_id AS accedeOrderId, brp.credit_status AS creditStatus, brp.recover_period as recoverPeriod, FROM_UNIXTIME(brp.recover_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS recoverTime FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan brp LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron ba ON ba.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND ba.api_type = 1 AND brp.recover_period = ba.period_now WHERE brp.recover_time < unix_timestamp(CURDATE()) AND (brp.recover_yestime = '' OR brp.recover_yestime IS NULL) AND brp.recover_status = 0 AND ba.id IS NULL
